sentences.sContent: Then my husband started hassling me.
sentences.sCn: 然后我丈夫便开始不停地烦我。

synos.tran: 找麻烦，搅扰；与…争辩；使…烦恼

trans.tranCn: 找麻烦，搅扰；与…争辩；使…烦恼
trans.tranOther: If someone hassles you, they cause problems for you, often by repeatedly telling you or asking you to do something, in an annoying way
something that is annoying, because it causes problems or is difficult to do
